content:
The death toll from the Russian missile attack on Odesa has increased to 21 people.

About thisreportedMinister of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Ihor Klymenko, ArmyInform reports.

"Today, another SES employee, another victim of yesterday's Russian blow to Odessa, was killed in a hospital from a serious injury," the statement said.

More than 70 more were injured in varying degrees, there are "heavy".

Formerly ArmyInformreportedthat the day of mourning is announced in Odessa.
title: Another SES employee died in the hospital from yesterday's blow to Odessa
description: This was announced by the Minister of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Ihor Klymenko, ArmyInform reports.   ...
author: Army Inform
